评论用户: i purchased this bag plus a few others for college! i walk around campus and im also in physical fitness class this semester. the goal was to stay hydrated so i could walk the miles around campus but also stay hydrated! i am also in a weight loss journey and i feel this will work for me!
评论详情: i bought this because i was going on vacation with my boyfriends family and didn’t want to wear a two piece …  safe to say it’s my favorite bathing suit! it fits me soooo well. i was 217 and 5’3 at the time and it fit great. the slit in the front was almost too much but it’s nothing a little sewing couldn’t fix <3  if you’re alternative and you’re thinking about purchasing JUST GET IT!!
Not a good fit for curvy women.

So, I really liked the style and pattern of this suit. The front is great. It's super has a super cute cut to it and the pattern is just not something you normally see. The back on the other hand is see through and I am not going to be wearing it. I'm not a fan of exposing my backside to the entire public pool.
Complimentary bathing suit, very comfortable, has good stretchiness, fits well, flatters most body shapes, just looks a little Spider-Man like.

I ordered this suite in an extra large size and it is a little large.  I should have ordered my usual size of large if I had wanted tummy control.  While this is not tight the style and design do hide my tummy really well.  I like that I can tie the top behind my neck as it allows me to keep it tight enough so I don't feel that my breasts will fall out due to the super low V-neck.  It is well made and the style makes me look and feel sexy.  This would cost a lot more in a store.  Great value; highly recommend!!
This swimsuit is super chick! It fits me great and has that vintage feel to it. It feels classy and like I took a step back in time when I wear it.

评论概述: Not great coverage unless you are a size 1 or 2
评论详情: As for fit, it ran a bit snugger than i thought it would...and I wen't up a size!!!  The cut was far different than what the listing showed. The top didn't provide good coverage for my wife, who is larger busted. Also, the back would stretch so much you could pretty much read through it.  The material felt thin (thus the back coverage issue) and she felt like the suit would fail in water.  She tried it, but, she won't wear it in public.

This swimsuit has a vintage style to it.  I got this in the Halloween spider print.  It looks like the photos and the sizing was good.  This is a high cut swimsuit so note that and somewhat cheeky.  I do think this price for this swimsuit is too high.
This design is cute! It look pretty good on me! Value isn’t bad! Comfortable and the butt coverage it just right, could use a little more for boobs.

评论概述: It fits, but kinda see through
评论详情: So this suit fits, I didn't expect it to fit as well as it does, actually. I have very large breasts, so the first thing I had to do was remove the little pads. There's absolutely no support whatsoever, but it does cover the middle quite nicely. The back tends to roll down which is annoying. As I said before it's definitely a little see through, and it's not as dark as I expected, but overall it worked. I went kayaking and didn't fall out of it at all. I wouldn't buy it again but it's good in a pinch. I did wear shorts over it though because again, the bottom part is very see through.
This bathing suit was true to size, flattering, and comfortable to wear. I felt that the print looked faded and less vibrant, but I still thought it was cute.

I did not realize how low-cut this bathing suit is. The v comes down to just a couple inches above my belly button. I absolutely love the pattern and the ruching does a really good job of disguising my belly, but holy wow that low cut is something to be reckoned with! I don't think I'd be brave enough to wear this out in public. One wrong move and the girls are gonna be loose! Really makes me sad, bc otherwise this is a beautiful suit.
Such a cute swim suit, I love the Halloween theme. It does have a deep V in front but has padding in the front to cover the girls.
it is a cute swim suit and fits well.

I absolutely love the gothic floral pattern on this swimsuit. I was worried this wouldn't fit well as I have a larger middle and a smaller top, but it fit great and true to size. You can adjust the halter for as much support as you need. Also has great stretch!

fits well. the swim suit is designed for someone on the bigger side, with a thick pannel around the stomach to keep things smooth looking. the design is very cool and this is a great suit for someone that wants to push themselves a bit while not being too revealing
This didn't fit well at all.  It's a beautiful suit but no coverage anywhere and bet uncomfortable.  The support was they but that's because it was so small!

评论概述: Love the pattern but not the fit
评论详情: The pattern made this an immediate pick for me because I love all things spooky and horror related but the fit of this swimsuit was totally and completely wrong for me. Normally I find swimsuits that are one piece a little too long for me because I'm 5'10 but it's all legs. I was shocked that this was as short on the bottom as it is, it fits but the back from my ribcage up is entirely out and if you've got any extra weight going on back there it hugs right under it and pushes it up and out. If you have a really thin frame or a strong back this will look stunning on you but on me, this isn't my favorite swimsuit which is a shame because I love the print. I don't think sizing up would make a huge difference either.
I love the colors and design. It fit well and looks great, very comfortable. It didn't support very well on the front but I liked the coverage.

评论概述: Nice suit, shape a bit weird
评论详情: This is a beautiful suit and has quite a lovely pattern to it. Thoughts as follows:  Pros: pattern is clearly printed and quite goth, which is different and nice. There are adjustable straps at the top to go around your neck. Padding in the bust area. Has some stretch to it.  Cons: sizing seems off; it feels a bit small to me. Stretch isn't there like it should be for a swimsuit, should be more stretchy than it is. Bust area is designed too low, so it's not great for someone with a longer torso or wider curves. Would be best for someone with a petite, not as curvy body type.
Gorgeous vintage style swim suit. Flattering and sexy. Halter neck. Tummy control.
No stretch which is a must whit stitching and white lining on a black suit. Undersized. Cheap fabric. Cups cut too small. Just an all around miss.

评论概述: The back is completely see through
评论详情: Top straps are short for the halter top which is really uncomfortable. Not great quality seeing as how the back of the suit isn’t lined so it was basically see through. Otherwise, the colors were the same and it did look more or less like the images shown. It’s a bummer bc I was really looking forward to wearing it but I’m not interested in offering a free show 🍑

Very pretty suit style and nice fabric.  The torso is quite long.  The bodice pieces are just too narrow for security, in my case.  If you are smaller breasted, you may be fine.  It's a very nice suit, well made, I just can't wear it.  Each bodice half is about 4" wide, so if that works for you, go for it.

评论概述: Beautiful Front Design, Back Didn't Work for her
评论详情: This swimsuit has a lovely fit and a pretty design that's very flattering from the front. However, the low-cut back wasn't to her liking.

评论概述: I don't know about tummy control...
评论详情: While not what I would consider tummy control, This suit definitely disguises it decently with the front rouching. The bra pads are easily removed, the neck tie isn't too terribly uncomfortable for prolonged use (if you know you know) and for the most part I didn't worry excessively about anything escaping. The bottoms are moderate coverage and the front is double lined. While the top isn't very supportive, it was still flattering. The only thing I truly don't care for is the the fit of the very top of the back of the suit - it hits a few inches below wear I normally wear my bra strap, and seems to fit tighter than anywhere else on the suit. This doesn't seem to add to the top support or the tummy control. Otherwise I really love this suit. Will order in other colors.

First, the cut is nice and mostly flattering! I like the halter, and it’s a high cut bottom- which I don’t love but many do.  There are serious issues before getting this bathing suit wet though. The material on the back is a different color. It’s not lined the same way so I don’t know if that’s what it is or not. The lining that is there doesn’t feel like normal swim suit lining either.  I would wear this in my backyard but not a public pool.
Why would you put a white liner in a black bathing suit? Seriously? The butt looked like a diaper... it was terrible

So cute but the butt is transparent! The whole front has a lining but the back doesn’t, which makes it see through. It’s such a cute swim suit I’m debating on retuning it or adding a lining myself. Would be perfect if the whole suit was lined.
To small. Floating white lining stretches white.

This suit has a really pretty print and feels like good quality. It didn’t come with a hygiene strip which wasn’t great but it’s sewn together well and fits well. The chest has liners which I appreciate and the halter strap is comfortable. There’s not a lot of support but I personally don’t need more than what it has. I wish it was a bit snugger of a fit for a more slimming factor but I appreciate that the bottoms fit comfortably without digging in. If I were to order again, I’d probably try a small. I’m 36B and usually wear a M for reference.
I get so many compliments in this bathing suit
Fit well and super cute. I was honestly really surprised how much I love this bathing suit
Very thin fabric, zero support, not enough chest fabric, definitly not for bigger chested girls. This suit is horrible. The coverage sucks and it does not look appealing.

I was initially concerned seeing how this product had no reviews so let me be the first! I'm a bigger chested person and was worried this wouldn't fit as I usually wear a large or extra large due to my chest but ordered a medium in this and it fit perfectly! The design is very cute and definitely worth the money.
